description:
Keep slugs and snails off your plants

Monterey® Garden Sluggo® Plus is a fast-acting and long-lasting slug bait to deter slugs, snails, and insect pests in your garden.

This OMRI-listed bait targets and controls slugs, snails, earwigs, pillbugs, cutworms, and other common garden pests. Simply sprinkle the granules around your plants and let Sluggo® Plus work its magic. Powered by natural ingredients, this long-lasting bait remains effective even after light rain to safeguard your vegetables, ornamentals, and other outdoor plants.

Sunday partners with trusted, effective solutions that support your garden’s health and harvest.

sections.product_features:
Granular bio-based slug and snail bait
Eliminates slugs, snails, and garden insects
Made with soil-based compounds
Ideal for use around vegetables, ornamentals, and more
OMRI-listed for organic gardening
Safe for pets, birds, and beneficial insects when used as directed
Remains effective after light rain
sections.ingredients:
Iron phosphate: Disrupts slug and snail digestion, causing them to stop feeding
Spinosad: Naturally derived from soil bacteria; kills a range of insect pests upon ingestion
